derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French descord (noun), descorder (verb), from Latin discordare, from discors 'discordant', from dis- (expressing negation, reversal) + cor, cord- 'heart'

entry.def: Discord is disagreement and argument between people.

means.word_mean: 2. disagreement among those expected to cooperate
4. strife resulting from a lack of agreement

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ing形容词→adj.相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
cord心脏,一致+ial……的→adj.首要的,主要的
accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ance表名词→n.一致,和谐,符合
cordial[adj.首要的,主要的]+ity表名词→n.诚心,热诚
discord[n.不和;不一致]+ance表名词→n.不协调;　不一致
ac加强+cord心脏,一致→心心相符
re一再+cord心脏,一致→一再放在心上→记录
